Title: Comparing text-based and dependence-based approaches for determining the origins of bugs
Published: JOURNAL OF SOFTWARE: EVOLUTION AND PROCESS
Purpose: to investigate the practical application of the text and dependence approaches for discovering the origins of bugs.
Elements_risk_assessment:
For each line altered in the fix the version it was previously altered 
    in is considered a possible origin of the bug
UseOF-SZZ: To determine when this bug was introduced
Summary: The study was performed by manually simulating both of the approaches on sets of bugs from three case studies: Eclipse, Rachota and jEdit.
Outcome:
Taking the most recent version as that which introduced the bug may not be the most
effective technique
